title: Wormwood Prophesy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/28/19
itunes:title: Wormwood Prophesy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/28/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Tom Horn discuss his work deciphering verses from the Bible that predict the asteroid Apophis hitting Earth in 2029 that will wipe out most life on the planet and bring about the biblical Apocalypse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
